Palm trees are a type of tree that is found in tropical and subtropical climates. They are usually tall and have a single trunk with large, fan-shaped leaves. Palm trees are often used as ornamental plants in landscaping.

Palm trees are a common sight along roads and in urban areas. They are tall, evergreen trees with fan-shaped fronds and a single trunk. Common types of palm trees include the Coconut Palm, Date Palm, and Canary Island Date Palm.
